news.markdown:
**SUCCESSFUL FUNDING FROM ARTS COUNCIL ENGLAND**
We are delighted to share the news that we have been [awarded our sixth grant from Arts Council England](https://www.artscouncil.org.uk/news/comedy-dance-theatre-bit-hiccup-secures-%C2%A340773-national-lottery-funding) which will support the creation and tour of our new work _Lovely Girls_. 
 

**BRAND NEW SHOW!** 

We had a great time presenting our new work _Lovely Girls_ as a work in progress in Bristol & London this Autumn. We'll be heading back into the studio in the new year to develop it further before our Spring Tour which kicks off on International Women's Day (8 March 2019). See below for full tour schedule.
news.html:
SUCCESSFUL FUNDING FROM ARTS COUNCIL ENGLAND
We are delighted to share the news that we have been awarded our sixth grant from Arts Council England which will support the creation and tour of our new work Lovely Girls.

BRAND NEW SHOW!

We had a great time presenting our new work Lovely Girls as a work in progress in Bristol & London this Autumn. We’ll be heading back into the studio in the new year to develop it further before our Spring Tour which kicks off on International Women’s Day (8 March 2019). See below for full tour schedule.

events.markdown:
**Women's Day Everyday Tour: _Lovely Girls_ Spring 2019**

**8th March: BATH**
Bath Spa Live, 7.30pm **[Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/Online/default.asp?BOparam::WScontent::loadArticle::permalink=hiccup2019&BOparam::WScontent::loadArticle::context_id=)**

**14th March: LIVERPOOL** 
Edge Hill University Arts Centre, 7.30pm **[Tickets](https://www.edgehill.ac.uk/events/2019/03/14/lovely-girls/)**
 
**22nd March: DORSET** 
Bridport Arts Centre, 7.30pm **[Tickets](https://www.bridport-arts.com/event/lovely-girls/)**

**24th March: EXETER** 
Exeter Phoenix, 8pm **[Tickets](https://www.exeterphoenix.org.uk/events/lovely-girls/)**

**29th March: BRIGHTON**
The Old Market, 7.30pm **[Tickets](http://theoldmarket.com/shows/lovely-girls/)**

**4th April: HEREFORD**
The Courtyard Theatre, 7.45pm **[Tickets](https://www.courtyard.org.uk/events/lovely-girls/)**


_More performance dates to be announced soon, stay tuned!_
